body_html: @AnlanSun Your code seems to write checkpoints based on epoch number. You load epoch 66, then start training from epoch=0 and overwrite checkpoints every 1000 steps. Are you sure you didn't overwrite your own checkpoint file at some point?
body_text: @AnlanSun Your code seems to write checkpoints based on epoch number.  You load epoch 66, then start training from epoch=0 and overwrite checkpoints every 1000 steps.  Are you sure you didn't overwrite your own checkpoint file at some point?
body: @AnlanSun Your code seems to write checkpoints based on epoch number.  You load epoch 66, then start training from epoch=0 and overwrite checkpoints every 1000 steps.  Are you sure you didn't overwrite your own checkpoint file at some point?
